description:
Self-employed persons

Explanatory notes for the following statistics:
12211 Microcensus

Definition:
Self-employed persons are people who manage, both
economically and in organisational terms, a commercial
enterprise, establishment or local unit or an agricultural
holding as its owner, co-owner or leaseholder. Also included
are self-employed commercial agents, all freelancers, people
who are engaged in a trade or business at home, and specific
masters.
Not regarded as self-employed are persons in an employment
relationship (with an enterprise, establishment or a local
unit) who can take their own decisions only within their
field of work (for instance self-employed branch managers).


© Statistisches Bundesamt, Wiesbaden 2017
name: Self-employed persons
